name: Shakunetsu no Miko Shizune
summary: Shizune Ayatsuji was born in a prestigious priestess family and raised to become an Exorcist. One day, she confronted a powerful Fiend. Shizune did not stand a chance, but her mother Kaori, also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her. Shizune made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.
